# Release Notes 1.0.9 (English primary)
JP: リリースノート（日本語は下記）

- Documentation updated to be English-first with Japanese subtext
- Added demo asset update guide (`docs/demo_assets.md`)
- Added CLI flags: `--unity-mcp-url` / `--blender-mcp-url`
